response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premier product, which we believe has the potential to revolutionize your business or personal endeavors. This exceptional item, valued at $800,000 to us due to its innovative features and high-quality craftsmanship, is now available for acquisition. We are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $750,000, aiming to provide you with unparalleled value while ensuring a mutually beneficial transaction. Please let us know if this proposal aligns with your interests and budget.", "product_price": 750000}
